articles.content: ISLAMABAD (Reuters) - AstraZenecas COVID-19 vaccine has been approved for emergency use in Pakistan, the health minister said on Saturday, making it the first coronavirus vaccine to get the green lig… [+2076 chars]

articles.title: Indian-American, Close Trump Aide On Healthcare Issues, Quits - NDTV
articles.description: Seema Verma, one of the highest-ranking Indian Americans in the outgoing Trump administration, has resigned from her top healthcare position, days ahead of Joe Biden's swearing in as the next president of the United States.
articles.content:
Seema Verma, 50, tendered her resignation to President Donald Trump on Thursday (File)
